title: 60 FPS Video Settings
custom_preconds: Given a user is using Android At Bat
custom_steps: When a user taps on Settings
custom_expected:
Then they will see a tab titled "High Quality Streaming"
between "Homescreen Selection" and "Low Memory"

title: Three Options
custom_preconds:
Given a user is using Android At Bat
and taps on Settings
custom_steps: When a user selects "High Quality Streaming"
custom_expected:
Then they will see three options to choose from: Always, Wi-Fi Only, Off
with "..data rates may apply" text

title: Default Option
custom_preconds:
Given a user is using Android At Bat
and taps on Settings
custom_steps: When a user selects "High Quality Streaming"
custom_expected: Then the default option will be "Wi-Fi Only"

title: Lite User
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android handset
and is a LITE user
custom_steps: (use Charles Proxy and search for "master_" for playback scenarios)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has High Quality Streaming set to "Always"
and launches video 
(Game of the Day, Video Index, Videos in News articles, Gameday Video Highlights for Final Games)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 30 FPS video
and master_mobile as the playback scenario
(shouldn't see 60)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has High Quality Streaming set to "Wifi-Only" on a Wifi Connection
and launches video
(Game of the Day, Video Index, Videos in News articles, Gameday Video Highlights for Final Games)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 30 FPS video
and master_mobile as the playback scenario
(shouldn't see 60)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has High Quality Streaming set to "Wifi-Only" on a Carrier Connection
and launches video 
(Game of the Day, Video Index, Videos in News articles, Gameday Video Highlights for Final Games)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 30 FPS video
and master_mobile as the playback scenario
(shouldn't see 60)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has High Quality Streaming set to "Off"
and launches video 
(Game of the Day, Video Index, Videos in News articles, Gameday Video Highlights for Final Games)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 30 FPS video
and master_mobile as the playback scenario
(shouldn't see 60)

title: Single Team + At Bat Premium User
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android handset
and is logged in with a Single Team + At Bat account
and has 60 FPS enabled in Settings
custom_steps: (use Charles Proxy and search for "master_" for playback scenarios)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user launches their entitled Single Team TV feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 30 FPS video
and master_mobile as the playback scenario
(shouldn't see 60)

custom_steps_separated.content: when the user launches MLB.TV Game of the Day feeds or MLB PLUS Game of the Day feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 60 FPS video
and master_tablet_60 as the playback scenario
